This restaurant is located just in fron the Royal Palace. It is an elegant place that offers a Mediterranean cuisine mixing traditional and modern concepts, elaborated with high quaality products.

It has two floors and a very nice terrace. The main dinning room has a capacity for 70 pax and it is possible to book for groups in the terrace paying a supplement.
